item.title: Clicking Sharks? Scientists Capture The First Audio Of Sharks Making Noise
item.description: A small shark species has been recorded making clicking sounds, challenging the long-held belief that sharks are silent hunters.

item.title: Here Are The Three Nights To Look At The Moon In April
item.description: April 2025 brings three key lunar events, from a crescent moon near planets to a stunning full ‘Pink Moon’ rising in the east.

item.title: Obvious vs perhaps
item.description: “Obvious” closes the door to inquiry. “Perhaps” opens it.
